146666.「<pc>様！ スライムレースに\n ご参加いただき ありがとうございました！\:
Thank you for participating in the slime race! Thank you for participating in the slime race! Now, I'll give you the gold for
your victory points! ... What? There's too much money on hand for me to give you... Please come back with less money.

146667.<se_nots System 35>\n「……あら？\n <pc>様 大変です:
<se_nots System 35>
Huh...? <if_woman>Ms.<else>Mr.<endif> <pc>!
This is bad! Something's happening
to <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>!
<bw_break>

146669.「あら？ まだ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>の\n とくぎの習得が 終わ:
Huh? <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> still hasn't
finished learning their skills yet.
<bw_break>

146670.「あら？ まだ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>の\n エサやりが 終わって:
Huh? <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> still hasn't
been completely fed yet.
<bw_break>

146673.「次回も <pc>様にお会いできるのを\n 楽しみに お待ちしております！\n<:
I look forward to seeing you again next time!
<end>

146675.「あら！\n <pc>様 来ていただけたのですね！\n<br>\n「<pc>様の:
Oh, ! I'm so glad that you could come!
Thanks to your efforts, the <%sM_EX_RACE> has concluded with great success!

146676.<se_nots System 7>\n賞金 <%nM_AWARD>ゴールドを受:
<se_nots System 7>
Received a prize of
<%dM_AWARD> Gold!
<end>

146684.「もう一度 レースに参加されますか？\n<yesno><break>:
Would you like to enter into another race?
<yesno><break>

146685.「他の人を 仲間に誘っている間は\n チャンピオンシップへ 出場できません！\n:
You can't participate in the Championship
while you have a pending party invitation!
You'll have to cancel that first.
<bw_break>

146686.「あら？ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n まだ チャンピオンシップへ:
Hm? <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> is not yet eligible to enter the Championship.
To be eligible, you'll first need to use any remaining qualifier entries you might still have.

146687.「他の人と パーティを組んでいると\n チャンピオンシップへ 出場できません！\:
You can't enter the Championship if you're in
a party with someone! Please leave your party
first.
<bw_break>

146697.「<%sM_BEST_GRADE>で １着を取ることで 今よりも\n 上級のレー:
By getting first place in <%sM_BEST_GRADE>,
you can move up to a more advanced race. Do
you want to participate in <%sM_GRADE>?
<yesno2><break>

146700.「おみごと！ １着 おめでとうございます！\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n:
Well done! Congratulations on your first place
finish! That earns you <%dM_GOT_POINT> points!

146701.「……４着でした。\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n <%nM_GOT_POI:
Oh, fourth place...
You'll earn <%dM_GOT_POINT> points
for that.
<bw_break>

146703.「おみごと！ １着 おめでとうございます！\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n:
Well done! Congratulations on your first place finish! That earns you <%dM_GOT_POINT> points!
Wow! Due to you and your Slime's amazing performance, you've earned the right to participate in the Championship!
The Championship pits you against renowned Slimes of other adventurers, and it offers much larger point rewards!
I'll give you your race entry right away. Try your luck in the Championship and see if you can strike it rich!

146704.「なんと！ <pc>様と <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>の\n すばらしい:
Wow! Due to you and your Slime's amazing performance, you've earned the right to participate in the Championship!
The Championship pits you against renowned Slimes of other adventurers, and it offers much larger point rewards!
I'll give you your race entry right away. Try your luck in the Championship and see if you can strike it rich!

146705.「おしい！ ２着でした！\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n <%nM_GOT_:
Oooh, so close! Second place!
That'll earn you <%dM_GOT_POINT> points.
<bw_break>

146706.「う～ん 残念。３着でした。\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n <%nM_GO:
Hmmm...third place. Too bad.
That'll earn you <%dM_GOT_POINT> points.
<bw_break>

146707.「おみごと！ １着 おめでとうございます！\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n:
Well done! Congratulations on your first place finish! You've earned <%nM_GOT_POINT> points for your victory! I can't believe you
won the Master I so quickly. and <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> are the rising stars of the slime racing world! Let's go! Please take part in the race until you've used up all of your remaining entry rights, and show off what you've done! If your performance is as good as <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> and <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>, you may be offered a chance to compete in the
Championship! The Championship is a race where you can race against famous slimes raised by other adventurers, and the points
you earn are huge! It's a chance to get rich! You'll have the chance to win a fortune, so you'll have to race until you've used up all
of your remaining entry rights.

146708.「マスターⅠで １着をとられましたので\n チャンピオンシップへの 出場が\n:
Since you've gotten first place in Master Ⅰ, you are now eligible to participate in the Championship!
The Championship pits you against the renowned Slimes that other adventurers have raised.

146709.「おみごと！ １着 おめでとうございます！\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n:
Well done! Congratulations on your first place finish! You have earned <%dM_GOT_POINT> points for your victory!
For taking first place in <%sM_GRADE>, you're eligible to participate in <%sM_GRADE_UP>! We hope you'll try it out!

146710.「あら！ みごと\n 大会予選を 走りきりましたね！\n おめでとうございます！:
Oh, my! You made it through all of the qualifier rounds! Congratulations!
The total Victory Points you earned during the qualifiers was <%dM_POINT> points.
If you come here once the event ends, you'll earn Gold equal to the amount of Victory Points you earned!
From here, you'll be able to participate in the Championship and race against the Slimes of other adventurers.
It costs 100,000 points to enter a Championship match, and you'll earn points based on what place you come in.
If you win one race, you will get bonus points in the next race you win, and so forth. Try to earn lots of points!
You don't need entries to participate, so you can keep increasing your total points by winning races.
However, the prize money is capped at 1 million Gold, regardless of how many points you earn above that.
Also, your current points will be recorded as your qualifiers score.
If your Victory Points fall under this score, you'll still earn Gold equal to what your qualifier score was, so don't worry.
Go on and give the Championship everything you've got!

146711.<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は 満面の笑みで\n<pc>のまわりを とび:
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> had a big smile on his face
<pc> He's jumping all over the place! He's so
happy to be in the Championship!<end>

146712.「今回の再エントリーで 最後となります。\n がんばってください。\n<end>: This will be my last reentry... Good luck...<end>

146713.「再エントリーすると 予選参加権を\n ５回分 受け取る代わりに\n 勝利ポイン:
If you choose to re-enter, you will receive five more qualifier entries. However, your current Victory Points will reset to 0.
Please note that you will lose all current Victory Points and qualifier points.
Are you sure you want to re-enter the <%sM_RACE>, starting over from the qualifiers?

146714.「……あら。\n <pc>様の 勝利ポイントが\n １０万ポイント未満に なって:
Oh... Your Victory Points are now less than 100,000, I see...
I'm really sorry to say this, but unfortunately you can no longer participate in any races.
You've currently earned a total of <%dM_POINT> Victory Points.
Your Qualifying Points are now <%dM_AWARD> points.
If you come back here when the tournament is over, you'll get a Gold reward equal to your Qualifying Points!

146715.<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n<pc>に 育ててくれたお礼を伝えた。:
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> expressed their
gratitude to <pc> for raising
them.
<bw_break>

146716.「チャンピオンシップへの出場で\n よろしいですか？\n<yesno><brea:
So you'd like to participate in the
Championship?
<yesno><break>

146719.「<pc>様は こちらのレースに\n 出場できますよ。\n 何をなさいますか？\:
You are eligible to participate in this race.
What would you like to do?
<break>

146720.「<%sM_GRADE>への出場で\n よろしいですか？\n<yesno><br:
So you'd like to participate in
<%sM_GRADE>?<yesno><break>

146721.「スライムのつよさは ４つの能力\n スピード ジャンプ率 スタミナ 最大ＭＰ\:
A slime's stats are divided into four categories: Speed, Jump Rate, Stamina, and Max MP.
Speed increases how fast a slime runs, while Jump Rate causes your slime to jump more often and dodge traps.
Stamina causes your slime to get tired less often, and Max MP will allow your slime to use more skills during a race.
Each stat can be raised by leveling up and feeding your slime special feed.
However, a stat won't improve unless it advances to a higher rank.
Also, keep in mind that stats can no longer grow when a Slime becomes eligible to enter the Championship!

146722.「アストルティアカップとは\n 育てたスライムで\n ビッグな賞金獲得を 目指す:
The Astoltia Cup has some of the hottest Slime Races around, with big prizes for the best Slimes out there!
When the competition ends, you'll be able to redeem the Victory Points you've earned for some cold hard cash!
There are two stages: the prelims against strong opponents, and then the championship against Slimes raised by other adventurers.
In the prelims, you'll first earn your starting Victory Points. Those points will then be wagered in the championship.
Oh, and there are some restrictions on the normal rules. You cannot check the tactics your opponents are using.
Also, please remember that you have a limited amount of time to choose your tactics.

146723.「何について ご説明いたしますか？\n<break>: What would you like me to explain?<break>

146724.「賞金は 勝利ポイント\n １ポイントにつき １ゴールドとして\n 大会終了後に:
The prize money is one gold for every point won, and will be given to you at the end of the tournament... However, the prize money is
limited to 1 million gold... If you earn more than 1,000,000 Victory Points, the prize will still be 1,000,000 Gold. If your victory
points are less than your qualifying points, you will still receive the amount of your qualifying points as your prize. So don't
worry, you can still challenge for the championship! You will also receive your prize at the end of the tournament...

147138.「あら？ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n すでに何度も きたえなおさ:
What? Your <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has already been re-rigged so many times that you no longer have the right to race... I'm sorry,
but I can't participate in any more races during this tournament... Sorry... Look forward to the next one!

150116.「それでは 何をなさいますか？\n<break>: So what can I do for you?<break>

150734.「どのエサをあげるか 選んでください。\n ３つ あげられますよ。\n<brea:
You can choose which one you want to feed...
I can give you three...<break>

150735.「大会には 『レースエントリー』から\n 出場することができますよ。まずは\n:
You can enter the race by clicking on "Race
Entry"... First, please aim to win the
Beginner III!<bw_break>

150737.「<pc>様の 勝利ポイントは\n この子が 更新してくれた……ええと…\n<b:
Your Victory Points were updated by this

<bw_break>

150738.「<pc>様！ スライムレースに\n ご参加いただき ありがとうございました！\:
Thank you so much for participating in the Slime Races!
We hope that you'll join us next time! We're looking forward to seeing you again!

151015.「それでは <pc>様と <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>が\n パートナー:
In that case As a memento of your partnership with <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>, you will receive three pieces of food of your choice... When a slime
eats food, it grows... The ability to grow differs depending on the type of food, so please choose the food that best suits your
style...

151016.「それでは <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>に\n レース参加権を 差し上げ:
Now, I'm going to give <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> the
right to participate in the race, so let's
get him racing!<end>

151021.「かしこまりました！\n 参加費は マッチング成立後\n レース開始時に 回収い:
Yes, sir! The entry fee will be collected at
the start of the race...<end>

151022.「かしこまりました！\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>が １着を取れるよ:

carefully so that <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>
can make it to first place!
<end>

151023.「申し訳ありませんが <pc>様は\n すでに 賞金をお受け取りになられています:
I'm sorry, sir<pc> Since you have already received your prize
money, you will not be able to race during
this event...<bw_break>

151024.「あら？\n これ以上 再エントリーはできませんよ。\n<bw_break>: What? I can't re-enter any more...<bw_break>

151437.「<pc>様の 賞金として\n <%nM_AWARD_TOTAL>ゴールドを お:
I'll give you <%nM_AWARD_TOTAL> gold as your prize! What? I don't think I have enough money... Please come back later with less
money...

151438.「スライムレースでは レースが始まる前に\n どこで どのとくぎを使うか\n さ:
In a slime race, before the race begins, you make a decision about where and how you're going to use each nail. Each time the slime
runs a certain distance, it uses one nail at a time. However, only the first one is used by all the slimes at the same time, according
to the first slime. Also, you can check your opponent's strategy when setting up a strategy, so make good use of this...

151441.「あげたいエサを １つ選んでくださいね。\n<break>: Please choose one bait to give...<break>

151443.「<pc>様！ スライムレースに\n ご参加いただき ありがとうございました！\:
Thank you for participating in the slime race! Thank you for participating in the slime race! We're holding a <%sM_RACE> right
now! We hope you'll join us!

151444.「今回は きたえなおしたばかりですので\n お好みのエサを ３つ差し上げますね。:
We've just had them re-trained, so we'll give
you three of your choice of bait...<bw_break>

151445.「かしこまりました！\n さっそく レースに出場するスライムを\n <pc>様に: Yes, sir! I'll get the slime for the race.<pc> I'll let you decide!<bw_break>

151475.「<pc>様は チャンピオンシップへの\n 参加が初めてですね。チャンピオンシッ:
This is your first time participating in the Championship... The Championship is different from previous races in a couple of ways...
One, the entry fee... To enter the race, you must pay 100,000 gold... But since you don't have to pay to enter, you can keep trying as
long as you have victory points. You can keep adding to your victory points... But the prize is only 1,000,000 gold... If you earn
more victory points than that, the prize will still be 1,000,000 gold. And now...

151554.「あら？ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n まだ きたえなおしの途中で:
What? <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> is still in the
process of being re-conditioned... When
you're done, you'll be able to race again.<bw_break>

183540.「かしこまりました。\n ……おや。<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は みご:
Yes, sir... ..... <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> has successfully made it to the Championship... You can make <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> try again
from the Championship with the same strength as before... If he retries, his victory points and race entry will be restored to
what they were when he reached the Championship... <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>'s victory points for reaching the Championship will be
<%nM_AGAIN_POINT> points...

183541.「では <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を\n はじめの状態から きたえなお:
So, do we want to rerun <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>
from its initial state?<yesno2><break>

183542.「かしこまりました。\n それでは <pc>様の 勝利ポイントを\n すべて取り:
Yes, sir. Okay.<pc> I'll cancel all of your victory points and
give you this one!<end>

183768.「では <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>を 種族を変更せず\n 今と同じつよ:
So, let's retry <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> from the Championship with the same strength as before, but without changing your race. If
you retry, you'll get one less re-training... Are you sure you want to do this?

189199.「ようこそ スライムレース場へ！\n 何を なさいますか？\n<break>:
Welcome to the Slime Races!
What can I do for you?
<break>

189201.「あら？ <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n まだ きたえなおしの途中で:

process of being re-conditioned... When
you're done, you'll be able to race again.<bw_break>

189202.「会場にいない 仲間がいるようです。\n パーティを組んで 参加する場合は\n:
I know someone who won't be there... If you'd
like to join us as a party, please let us
know when you're all here...<end>

189203.「スライムレースに 参加可能なスライムを\n 持っていない仲間が いるようです。:
There are some of us who don't have enough
slime to participate in the slime race...
I'll call you when we're all ready.<end>

189205.「仲間が まだ準備中のようです。\n お手数ですが 全員の準備ができてから\n:
My colleagues are still preparing. I'm sorry
to bother you, but I'll call you again when
everyone's ready...<end>

189206.「パーティの人数が 変わりました。\n 全員の準備ができてから お声がけください:
The number of people at the party has
changed. I'll call you when everyone's
ready...<end>

189207.「仲間のひとりが 会場から\n 出てしまったようです。\n 全員そろってから お:
One of my colleagues has left the hall...
I'll call you when we're all here...<end>

189208.「『仲間とレースをする』では\n パーティの仲間と 一緒に\n レースすることが:
In the "Race with Friends" section, you can race with your party members... If you have less than four people in your party, you can
choose to race with any number of slimes that we have prepared. If you want to race with your friends, you'll need to talk to them
all. "Race with friends" is available outside of the Astral Tear Cup... So...

189209.「仲間とレースを ご希望ですね。\n こちらでは 勝利ポイントは もらえないので:
So you'd like to race with your party?
Please be aware that you cannot earn
Victory Points this way.
<bw_break>

189212.「……４着でした。\n 次こそは 逆転してやりましょう！\n<bw_break>:
Fourth place...
Let's make a comeback next time!
<bw_break>

189215.「レースに参加させるスライムを選んでください。\n なんと 自己ベスト時のつよさ:
Select a slime to participate in the race...
What's more, you can participate with your
best strength...
<select_se_off>
Current Strength
Strength at personal best
<select_end><break>

189216.「このスライムで参加します。\n よろしいですか？\n<break>: Join me in this slime... May I?<break>

Yes, sir! Please set up a good strategy so

189220.「お待たせしました！\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>が １着を取れるよ:

take the first place!<end>

189222.「『仲間とレースをする』では\n パーティの仲間と 一緒に\n レースすることが:
In the "Race with Friends" section, you can race with your party members... If you have less than four people in your party, you can
choose to race with any number of slimes that we have prepared. If you want to race with your friends, you'll need to talk to them
all. If you want to race with your friends, you'll need to talk to them all. We hope you enjoy it!

189504.「他の人を 仲間に誘っている間は\n 仲間とレースを することができません！\n:
You can't race with your friends while you're
inviting others to join you! Please wait
until everyone is ready before calling out...<end>

189505.「予期せぬエラーが 発生しました。\n 再度 お試しください。\n<end>:
An unexpected error has occurred. Please try

189509.「たった今！\n スライムレース大会運営に 動きがありました。\n すぐに準備を:
Just now! There's been some movement in the
slime race administration... We'll be ready
for you in a moment. I'll call you back...<end>

189658.「報酬があるので\n さっそく お渡ししますね！\n<br>\n「あら？ 持ち物:
I have a reward for you. I'll give it to you right away! What? We don't have enough space in our inventory, so it looks like we can't
hold all the items...

190088.「あら……ごめんなさい。\n 大会を 開催していない時は\n きたえなおすことが:
Oh... Sorry... I can't reshape it when the
tournament is not in session...<bw_break>

190089.「あら……ごめんなさい。\n 今は 大会を開催していないんです。\n 次回の開催:
Oh... Sorry... We're not holding the
tournament right now... You'll have to wait
until the next one!<bw_break>

190097.「申し訳ございませんが <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n まだ 仲間と:
I'm sorry, but <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> can't race with his friends yet... You'll only be able to do so if you participate in the race and
are accepted into the Championship!

190098.「申し訳ございませんが 選択したつよさでは\n 仲間とレースを することができま:
I'm sorry, but you can't race with your friends at your chosen strength. You'll only be able to participate if you've been
accepted to the Championship by participating in a race!

191093.「申し訳ございませんが <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は\n まだ 仲間と:
I'm sorry, but <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> can't race with his friends yet... You'll only be able to race with your friends if you've been

191158.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>は あと<%nM_LEFT_SLIME>回:
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME> can be re-tried
<%nM_LEFT_SLIME> times... How do I re-run it?
<select_se_off>
Same strength as now
From the initial state
in a bad temper
<select_end>

210812.「ありがとうございました！\n 仲間とレースは いつでもできるので\n また 遊:
Thank you very much! I'm always up for a race
with my buddies, so please come back and
visit!<end>

210813.「ありがとうございました！\n <pc>様が 大会終了後に 受け取れる\n 賞金:
Thank you so much! The prize money that you
will receive once the tournament is over is
<%dM_AWARD> Gold.
<end>

210814.「あら？ \n <pc>様が 大会終了後に 受け取れる\n 賞金は 0ゴールドで:
Oh?<pc> The prize money you will receive at the end
of the tournament is 0 gold...<bw_break>

210815.「スライムレース場へ ようこそ！\n ここは スライムレース受付です。\n<br:
Welcome to the Slime Races! This is the Slime Race Hall.
Hm? And you are...? It seems this is your first time here since the Slime Races were renewed.
You can use Slimes you've raised to race against the Slimes of other adventurers, and even participate in tournaments!
Now, then...

210816.「スライムレース場へ ようこそ！\n ここは スライムレース受付です。\n<br:
Welcome to the Slime Races! This is the Slime Race Hall.
Hm? You don't have any Slimes. If you speak to the receptionist next to me, you can start raising your own Slime.

210817.<speed=0>\n予期せぬエラーが 発生しました。\n時間をおいて 再度 お:
<speed=0>I'm getting an unexpected error. Please give
it some time and try again.<end>

210818.「あら？ 申し訳ありません。\n マッチングに 失敗してしまったようです。\n:
Oh, no. I'm sorry... I'm sorry, the match
failed. Please try again...<end>

210819.「あら？ 育成受付係のブレダが\n 何か言いたそうに しています。\n となりで:
What? Bredda, the nursery receptionist, looks like she's about to say something... If you'll excuse me, I have some business to
attend to next door...

210820.「申し訳ございません。ただ今\n 開催されているレースは 休止しております。\n:
I'm sorry... We're sorry, but the race is now
cancelled. Please come back in a few minutes!<end>

210821.「あら？ 前回のレース結果を\n まだ お伝えしていませんでしたね。\n ええと:
What? I haven't told you the results of the
last race yet... Well...<pc> The results of your test are
<bw_break>

210822.「あら？\n まだ 前回のレース結果が出ていませんね。\n 結果が出るまで 少々:
What? The results from the last race aren't
in yet... We'll have to wait a bit for the
results...<end>

210823.「あら……ごめんなさい。\n 今は 大会を開催していないんです。\n 次回の開催:
Oh... Sorry... We're not holding the
tournament right now... You'll have to wait
until the next one!<bw_break>

210824.「あら……ごめんなさい。\n 今は<pc>様が こちらで確認できる\n ランキン:
Oh... I'm sorry... Not now.<pc> There are no rankings that you can see
here...<bw_break>

210825.「スライムレース場へ ようこそ！\n 何を なさいますか？\n<break>:
Welcome to the Slime Races!
What can I do for you?
<break>

210826.「他に ご用は ありますか？\n<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

210827.「あら？ スライムを お持ちでないようですね。\n となりの育成受付係で申し込め:
What? You don't seem to have any slime. If
you sign up at the nurturing desk next door,
we can get you your own slime.<bw_break>

210832.「かしこまりました！\n <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>が １着を取れるよ:
Understood! Please plan your strategy
carefully so that <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>
can make it to first place!
<end>

210833.「……４着でした。\n 残念ですが\n 勝利ポイントは 獲得できません。\n<b:
...Fourth place, I see. Too bad.
You won't earn any Victory Points.
<bw_break>

210835.「<pc>様！\n 今大会 <%sM_RACE>に\n ご参加いただき ありがと:
Thank you so much for participating in the <%sM_RACE>!
It's no longer possible to participate, but you can still raise your Slimes. We hope you'll join us in the next event!

210836.「あら？\n 参加に必要な 勝利ポイントを\n 持っていないため 参加できません:
Hm? You don't have any Victory Points, so
you're unable to participate.
<bw_break>

210837.「あら！ <pc>様！ すごいですよ！\n とてつもない額の 勝利ポイントを\n:
Oh, my! Yes, sir! It's amazing! We've earned a tremendous amount of victory points... We're so glad you liked the slime race... Champion!
Thank you very much! If I enter the <%sM_GRADE> race, I won't earn any more victory points, is that okay with you?

210838.「チャンピオンシップとは 他の冒険者が育てた\n スライムと 競走できるレースで:
The Championship is a race where you compete against slimes raised by other adventurers. To qualify for the Championship, you must
complete the preliminary rounds... You pay 100,000 points to enter the Championship, and you earn victory points based on your
placement. If you finish first, you get a victory bonus in the next race, so you can earn more victory points... Since you don't
need to participate, you can keep increasing your victory points by winning... However, please note that if your victory points fall
below 100,000 points, you will not be able to participate in the race unless you re- enter...

210839.「大会予選とは アストルティアカップに\n エントリーした お客様が\n 最初に:
The qualifying rounds are the first races that customers enter in the Astoltia Cup... There are five rounds in total, and depending
on your rank, you can earn victory points that are needed to qualify for the championship... In order to earn the most
victory points, please do your best! The victory points you earn by completing the qualifying rounds are the minimum guaranteed
prize money you'll receive at the end of the tournament...

210840.「ほかにも何か ご説明いたしますか？\n<break>:
Is there anything else you'd like to share
with us?<break>

210841.「レースに参加させるスライムを選んでください。\n<break>:
Choose the Slime you'd like to race.
<break>

210842.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>で参加します。\n よろしいですか？\n<:
Are you sure you want to use
<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>?
<yesno><break>

210843.「そこは 空き部屋のようですね。\n スライムがいる部屋を選んでください。\n<:
It looks like this room is vacant. Please
choose a room with a Slime.
<bw_break>

210845.「つよさと とくぎについて 確認できますよ。\n<break>:
You can check its stats and skills here.
<break>

210846.「ただいま スライムレースの祭典\n <%sM_RACE>を\n 期間限定で:
We're holding a Slime Race Festival, called <%sM_RACE>, for a limited time only!
The Astoltia Cup has some of the hottest Slime Races around, with big prizes for the best Slimes out there!
So come on and enter the Astoltia Cup today! Your dreams of becoming a millionaire may just come true!

210847.「そうですか……。<%sM_RACE>は\n <%nM_CLOSE_MONTH>:
I see... Well, the <%sM_RACE>
will be open until <%dM_CLOSE_MONTH>/<%dM_CLOSE_DAY>, so
we hope you'll reconsider and join us!
<end>

210848.「かしこまりました！\n 遊び方や注意点を 簡単にご説明いたしますね。\n<br:
Got it! Here's a brief explanation how to play and some things to look out for.
The Astoltia Cup consists of two stages: the qualifiers and the championship, where participants compete to earn Victory Points.
These points are crucial as they will be converted into Gold at the end of the event. 1 point equals 1 Gold!
First, you'll want to join the qualifiers and earn Victory Points. You'll be able to play based on the number of entries you have.
However, there are some rules and limitations. You won't be able to see other players' tactics, and there's a time limit for choosing
your own tactics.
And that concludes the explanation of the Astoltia Cup! If you'd like to know more, feel free to ask for an explanation!

212058.「アストルティアカップでは\n ２種類のランキングを 用意しています。\n<br:
At the Astoltia Cup, we have two types of rankings... One is the World Rankings... One is the World Rankings... where the top 100
players are listed from among all players. If you're ranked at the end of the tournament, you'll receive not only victory points, but
also prizes and special prizes... You can check the prizes and special prizes from the "World Ranking Rewards"... There's a ranking board on your left. You can check the world rankings there... The other one is for Team and Friends... You can see the rankings of your team and friends. You can check your team and friend rankings from "Team and Friend Rankings"...

212104.「なんと！ <%nM_AWARD>ポイントです！\n <pc>様の すばらしい:
Wow! That's <%dM_AWARD> points! Your strategy and <%sM_BEST_SLIME>'s performance was amazing!
As for your prize, you've won <%dM_AWARD> Gold! Congratulations!

212105.「なんと！ <%nM_ACTIVE_POINT>ポイントです！\n <%nM_A:
Wow! You managed to earn <%dM_ACTIVE_POINT> points?!
You earned an incredible amount of Victory Points this time around! Congratulations on your success!
The reward limit is <%dM_LIMIT_AWARD> Gold, so your prize comes out to be <%dM_AWARD> Gold!

212106.「なんと！ <%nM_ACTIVE_POINT>ポイントです！\n <pc>様の:
Wow! That's <%dM_ACTIVE_POINT> points! This wouldn't have been possible without you and <%sM_BEST_SLIME>'s incredible performance!
The reward's upper limit is <%dM_LIMIT_AWARD> Gold, so your reward comes out to <%dM_AWARD> Gold!

212107.「<%nM_ACTIVE_POINT>ポイントですね。\n <pc>様は 大会予:
You earned <%dM_ACTIVE_POINT> points, I see. You did a great job in the qualifiers earning those points!
Your prize this time is <%dM_AWARD> Gold for the score that you earned!

214188.「大会は\n <%nM_CLOSE_MONTH>月<%nM_CLOSE_DAY>:
The tournament will be held until <%dM_CLOSE_MONTH>/<%dM_CLOSE_DAY>.
Please be sure to remember that!
<end>

215234.「まだ チャンピオンシップに 参加することは\n できません。大会予選を終えるこ:
You can't participate in the championship
yet... You'll have to complete the qualifying
rounds before you can participate...<bw_break>

215236.「あら？\n <pc>様は すでに大会予選を\n 走り切ったため 参加できません:
You've already used up all of your qualifier
entries, so you can't participate.
<bw_break>

215238.「再エントリーは 大会予選を終えると\n できるようになります。\n<bw_br:
You can re-enter after you've completed all
of your qualifier games.
<bw_break>

215240.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>で参加します。\n 参加費として １０万ポ:
You'd like to use <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>.
The participation fee is 100,000 Victory
Points. Is that all right?
<yesno2><break>

215622.「<%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>で参加します。\n アストルティアカップで:
You'd like to use <%sM_ACTIVE_SLIME>? Please note
that a Slime's level will not increase during
the Astoltia Cup. Is that all right?
<yesno2><break>

220272.「大会予選を終えると 再エントリーすることで\n 勝利ポイントを取り消して\n:
Once you've finished qualifying for the tournament, you can re-enter the tournament, which will cancel your victory points and
allow you to start over... You will lose all of your current victory points and all of your qualifying points, so please judge
carefully... If you've lost your victory points, but want to continue your challenge for the Astoltia Cup, you can use the re-
entry...

222164.「参加賞となります。\n こちらも お受け取りください！\n<end>:
There is also a participation prize. Please
take it!
<end>

250324.「何をなさいますか？\n <pc>様は 前レースで１位を取ったため\n 獲得勝利:
What can I do for you?<pc> Since you finished first in the last race,
you've earned more victory points...<break>

250325.「それでは 何をなさいますか？\n <pc>様は 前レースで１位を取ったため\n:
So what can I do for you?
Since you finished in first place in your last
race, you'll earn more Victory Points.
<break>

250326.「かしこまりました！\n ランキング報酬を 目指して\n がんばってくださいね！:
Yes, sir! Good luck in your quest for ranking
rewards!<end>

250327.「やりましたね！ １着 おめでとうございます！\n 連続で１着でしたので 獲得さ:
You did it! Congratulations on your first place finish! Since you've finished first in consecutive games, you've earned
<%nM_GOT_POINT> victory points!

250328.「おしい！ ２着でした！\n 勝利ボーナスが発生していたので 獲得された\n 勝:
So close! Second place! You've got a Victory
Bonus going, so you earned <%dM_GOT_POINT>
points.
<bw_break>

250337.「申し訳ありません。\n <%sM_RACE>は\n ただいま ランキング集計中:
Sorry... The <%sM_RACE> ranking is now being
calculated... Prizes will be handed out<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>日<th%nM_TIME>I'll be with you around... We'll have to wait
a bit for the results...<end>

250340.「<%sM_STRAGE>を <%nM_ITEM_NUM>こ\n 整理してから:
Please reorganize <%sM_STRAGE> into
<%nM_ITEM_NUM> and come back...<end>

250341.「あら……\n <pc>様は ワールドランキングの\n 上位１００位以内に ラン:
Oh, my You are ranked in the top 100 of the world rankings... The ranking for you is... What a surprise! First place! <%sM_EX_RACE> Congratulations on your victory!It must have been very difficult for you to accomplish such a feat... I really, really appreciate your hard work! This is the first
place winner. It's an exclusive giveaway! Please accept it!

<pc>   You are ranked in the top 100 of the world

<pc>   You are ranked in the top 100 of the world

250345.<se_nots System 7>\nワールドランキング報酬\n賞金 <%nM:

<%nM_ITEM_NUM_2> your prayer bag...<end>

250782.「あら？ <pc>様……？\n あなたの名前を ランキングで見た気がします。\n:
Oh?<pc> Sir...? I think I saw your name in the
rankings... You can check the rankings on the
board...<end>

250785.「再エントリー後 勝利ポイントを獲得する前に\n 大会が終了すると 賞金を受け取:
If you re-enter and the tournament ends before you have earned any victory points, you will not receive your prize money... Are
you sure you want to re-enter?

250980.「チャンピオンシップとは 他の冒険者が育てた\n スライムと 競走できるレースで:
The Championship is a race where you compete against slimes raised by other adventurers. To qualify for the Championship, you must
complete the preliminary rounds... You pay 100,000 points to enter the Championship, and you earn victory points based on your
position... Since you don't need to qualify, you can keep increasing your victory points by winning... However, please note that if
your victory points fall below 100,000 points, you will not be able to participate in the tournament unless you re-enter...

250981.「アストルティアカップでは\n ２種類のランキングを 用意しています。\n<br:
At the Astoltia Cup, we have two types of rankings... One is the World Rankings... One is the World Rankings... where the top 100
customers are listed... There's a ranking board on your left. You can check the world rankings there... The other one is for Team and Friends... You can see the rankings of your team and friends. You can check your team and friend rankings from "Team and Friend Rankings"...

251343.「あら……\n <pc>様は ワールドランキングの\n 上位１００位以内に ラン:
Oh, my
<pc>  You are ranked in the top 100 of the world
rankings...<pc> The rankings are
<bw_break>

251344.「なんと！ １位です！\n <%sM_EX_RACE>\n 優勝おめでとうござい:
Oh, my God! First place! <%sM_EX_RACE>
Congratulations on your victory!<break>

251345.「これほどの偉業を 成しとげるのは\n 大変だったと思います。\n 本当に 本当:
It must have been very difficult for you to accomplish such a feat... I really, really appreciate your hard work! This is the first

251346.「<%nM_RANK_NUM>位です！\n ベスト１０入りですね！\n おめでと:
You're ranked <%nM_RANK_NUM>! You're in the
top 10! Congratulations!<break>

251347.「最終結果で <%nM_RANK_NUM>位にランクインしたので\n 豪華景品を:
I've ranked <%nM_RANK_NUM> in the final
results, so I'll be giving away some great
prizes!<end>

251348.「<%nM_RANK_NUM>位です！\n ランクイン おめでとうございます！\:

on your rank!<break>

251349.「最終結果で 上位１００位以内に\n ランクインしたので\n 豪華景品を お渡し:
And since I'm ranked in the top 100 of the
final results, I'll be giving away some great
prizes!<end>

253451.「申し訳ありません。\n ただいま <%sM_RACE>の\n ランキング集計中:
Sorry about that... The ranking of <%sM_RACE>
is now being calculated... The end of the
ranking will be<tm%nM_TIME>月<td%nM_TIME>日<th%nM_TIME>We'll be here around... If you need me here,
please wait a moment...<end>

280989.「チャンピオンシップのレースでは\n 所持している 勝利ポイントに応じて\n 獲:
In the championship races, the victory points you earn depend on how many victory points you have. The more points you have, the
harder it gets, but it's a chance to show off your slime skills! Please do your best... And you can also see the victory points earned by
other point ranks, so if you're curious, you can check that out...

283179.「う～ん 残念。３着でした。\n 残念ですが\n 勝利ポイントは 獲得できません:

Points.

283180.「残念！ ３着でした！\n 勝利ボーナスが発生していたので 獲得された\n 勝利:

points.

283181.「……４着でした。\n 獲得された 勝利ポイントは\n <%nM_GOT_POI:

for that.
